exceptions.tactic: intros s j i H1 H2 H3 x0 H4.
intros s' j i H1 H2 H3 x0 H4.
intros s' j' i H1 H2 H3 x0 H4.
intros s' j' i' H1 H2 H3 x0 H4.

original: intros s j i H1 H2 H3 x0 H4. replace j with (S (j - 1)) by lia. replace (S (j - 1) < size s)%nat with (j < size s)%nat by lia. rewrite <- nth_last with (x0 := x0). apply sorted_nth in H1 as [H _]. apply H with (i := j - 1). - lia. - lia.
